info.title: PitchBook API - [People]
info.description: API for searching people and retrieving detailed information about individuals.

get.description: Retrieves people matching the specified search criteria.

parameters.name: firmNames
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of company names, IDs, websites, or tickers.

parameters.name: personNames
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of person names or IDs.

parameters.name: biography
parameters.description: Search for people by words and phrases in their biography.

parameters.name: university
parameters.description: Find people by their graduating institution.

parameters.name: positionLevel
parameters.description: Find people by their position level code.

parameters.name: positionTitle
parameters.description: Find people by the keywords related to their position titles.

parameters.name: primaryPositionOnly
parameters.description: Set this parameter to True to only search for primary positions.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Search for people by city of their entities.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of country codes.

parameters.name: stateProvince
parameters.description: Search for people by state or province of their entities.

parameters.name: postCode
parameters.description: Search for people by postal codes of their entities.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: Find people by first name.

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Find people by last name.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Find people by email.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Find people by their domain.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve.

get.description: Retrieves key data points about a specific person.

parameters.name: pbid
parameters.description: The unique ID of the person.

get.description: Retrieves contact information of the specific person.

parameters.name: pbid
parameters.description: The unique ID of the person.

get.description: Retrieves company, deal, fund, and advisory roles of the specific person.

parameters.name: pbid
parameters.description: The unique ID of the person.

get.description: Retrieves changes for the specific person for up to the last 90 days.

parameters.name: pbid
parameters.description: The unique ID of the person.

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Filter updates since a specific date. Use operators (>, <, ^). Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: trailingRange
parameters.description: Retrieve updates from the last N days.
